title: Be careful what you train on ...
description: Summary Using only image size and pixel counts, local validation kappa can easily reach 0.70+ This does NOT generalise to the test data Simple re-sizing is not enough to combat the issue, and CNN can easily overfit Use pre-processing wisely to overcome this
description_lemmatized: summary using image size pixel count local validation kappa easily reach 070 generalise test data simple resizing enough combat issue cnn easily overfit use preprocessing wisely overcome
